thread.title: Guinea-Bissau gets third PM in 5 weeks
thread.title_full: Guinea-Bissau gets third PM in 5 weeks | News24

author: news24.com
title: Guinea-Bissau gets third PM in 5 weeks
text:
Bissau - Guinea-Bissau's ruling party selected veteran politician Carlos Correia as prime minister on Thursday after two predecessors were removed in the space of weeks in the coup-prone West African state.
The country descended into political turmoil after President Jose Mario Vaz sacked popular prime minister Domingoes Simoes Pereira and his government on August 13.
Vaz replaced him with Baciro Dja, despite objections from the ruling PAIGC party, but he and his government were dismissed two days later to comply with a Supreme Court ruling.
"The political bureau of the liberating party of the country has...designated Carlos Correia, second vice president of the party," Pereira, former prime minister and PAIGC president, told reporters.
